title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2050.17 - Conduct of sample survey of City of Albany
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2050.17 - Conduct of sample survey of City of Albany

State Regulations

All persons who own, operate, manage, occupy or dwell in
any structure, or part thereof, subject to the Emergency Housing Rent Control

Law, as individuals or in any other capacity, shall give access to, assist and
cooperate with any and all representatives of the Division of Housing and

Community Renewal, in the conduct of any survey, investigation or inspection
with relation to such structure, or part thereof, upon the presentation of duly
authenticated credentials issued by the division. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
2050.17

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
